question: Some people prefer to shop for food in supermarkets. Other people prefer to do their food shopping online. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
text: While some people are of the opinion that purchasing food in the shops is more significant. However, others believe that it is more enjoyable to do the grocery shopping on the internet. In my point of view, I believe that it is a lot more significant to buy food online. In the next paragraphs, I will discuss both sides of this issue.

First of all, it will increase the cooking inspiration. The reason for this is that you will come across several products, which will look delicious to prepare. For instance, most of the mothers are using this technique to come up with brand new meals to prepare for their family. All in all, it will make it a lot more predictable for the cook to invest in a certain type of fruit and vegetables.

On the other hand, using the technology is quicker and money saving. This is because there is no time wasted, neither wealth used for extra purchases, which is unnecessary for our life. For instance, these days a lot of women's are providing a job, which makes it stressful to take care of the household chores as well. So that's why, it is much better for some people to have the nutriments send home.
To conclude, it is often argued by some that buying food products in the supermarkets are preferred

By a lot of people. Although, there is a group who believes that making an investment online is more preferable. In my opinion, I believe that it is better to buy online, because it's saves time and wealth, which is great to make time for other tasks.
